  • Method Details

    • skip

      public void skip(Class<? extends Token<?>> type)

    • getAnalyzer

      public <T extends Analyzer<?>> T getAnalyzer(Class<T> type)
      Retrieves an instance of the specified Analyzer type from the list of available analyzers. If no matching analyzer is found, returns null.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the Analyzer to retrieve
      Parameters:
      type - the Class object of the desired Analyzer type
      Returns:
      an instance of the specified Analyzer type, or null if no such instance is found

    • replaceAnalyzer

      public void replaceAnalyzer(Class<?> type, Analyzer<?> replacement)
      Replaces an existing analyzer of the specified type with a new analyzer. If no analyzer of the specified type is found in the list of analyzers, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the analyzer to be replaced
      replacement - the new analyzer that will replace the existing one
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified analyzer type is not registered

    • analyse

      public Token<?>[] analyse(Input input)
